text:
Bava#ntIqrna prAjA#yantaq tAH sa(gm)#rOqhO#&si nIrOqhO#&sItyEqva prA&ja#nayaqt tAH praqjAH prajA#tAq na pratya#tiShThaqn tA va#suqkO#&siq vESha#Srirasiq vasya#ShTiraqsItyEqvaiShu lOqkEShuq pratya#sthApayaqdyadAha# vasuqkO#&siq vESha#Srirasiq vasya#ShTiraqsIti# praqjA Eqva prajA#tA EqShu lOqkEShuq prati#ShThApayatiq sAtmAq&ntari#kSha(gm) ( ) rOhatiq saprA#NOq&muShmi#n ~MlOqkE prati# tiShThaqtyavya#d^^rdhukaH prANApAqnAByA$M Bavatiq ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || 30
(yuqktagrA#vA - praqjA mi#thuqnya# - ntari#kShaqM - dvAda#Sa ca) (A6)
